Text: well i think this one will backfire hard for the japanese, they better stop eating those creatures right now or else their ships will sink soon... i\'ll assist...

It's kind of harsh to say this but if someone on the Ady Gil was seriously injured or dead, whaling would have been banned instantly. Sinking an other ship isn't going to put a ban on whaling. For instance, the Steve Irwin sank 6 or 7 ships, they're still at sea.
